item.description:
Mate: A tag-based, event-driven Flex framework

The meeting Connect URL is:
http://adobechats.ado...
Use the Guest option and simply type in your name.

This week we will have a joint meeting with the Atlanta Flash/Flex User Group. The topic will be the new framework in the Flex world called Mate (pronounced mah -tey). Developed by AsFusion, Mate is an tag-based, event-driven framework that many will find far easier to work with. Using the MXML language, Mate provides an easy map to define how your application handles its events. Laura Arguello from AsFusion will show the many features and how to get started working with Mate. The presentation will cover best practices and real world examples.
item.name: Mate: A tag-based, event-driven Flex framework
